page.title: 10GOVERNMENT.(1.)
page.content: {Member of Parliament- }The whole area is represented by Peter Temple Morris, M.P. for the Leominster Constituency. He holds regular 'Surgeries' in the area to meet his constituents. {County Council.}Hereford and Worcester One Councillor represents this area. {District Council.}Leominster. 2 Local Councillors serve on this Council, which deals mainly with local Environmental and Health matters,Housing,Planning Permission, and Tourism. This is funded from Rates levied annually by the Council and supported by the Government. {Parish Council.}Three different Councils serve the area - Leysters and Middleton on the Hill, Little Hereford and Tenbury Town Council.They make recommendations and local representation to the District Council.
